spec_data.Name: grimmer-proggy-tinysz-fonts
spec_data.Description:
The proggy fonts are a set of fixed-width screen fonts that are designed for
code listings. Proggy Tiny Slashed Zero is identical to Proggy Tiny but has a
slashed zero instead of a dot.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 26 Jul 2017 02:26:50 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Proggy Tiny with slashed zero programming font
